Name: Fractal Fury
About the game: Fractal Fury is a third person online shooter with strategic dismemberment. Free to play for up to 16 players online or locally. 100% free without microtransactions or pay-to-win of any kind. Multiplayer and single-player with horde game mode. DISMEMBERMENT SYSTEM Shoot your opponents hands off to make them harmless. Shoot their legs off to immobilise them Shoot in a torso to destroy enemies armor and shoot in a core to destroy your enemy. Or extract a core and use it to repair yourself or to crete an energy shield There is also single player with hordes of zombies. GAME MODES Team Deathmatch – classic team deathmatch. Capture The Flag – kill all enemy team or capture the enemy flag and bring it to your base to win a round. Hardcore – very fast and tough sort of battle royale game mode. Small map, 4 minutes per round. Last alive player wins the round. OTHER FEATURES Players can host servers. LAN support. Single player with horde game mode.
Meta Title: Fractal Fury: Apr 4, 2021, Alex and Full Overview
